law.text: Subject to KRS 35.080, general courts-martial have jurisdiction to try persons subject to this code for any offense made punishable by this code, and may, under those limitations as the Governor may prescribe, adjudge any punishment not forbidden by this code.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 22, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 108, sec. 2. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 12. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 16, effective July 1, 1954.
